Package ohos.agp.components

Class TableLayout.Specification

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.TableLayout.Specification
  • Enclosing class:
    TableLayout

    public static class TableLayout.Specification
extends Object
    Configures column and row attributes of an element in a table layout.

    An element in a table layout must have a specific cell span, start cell, alignment mode or weight to determine its layout effect.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int alignment
      Defines vertical alignment for rows or horizontal alignment for columns.
      TableLayout.CellSpan span
      Defines the start cell and cell span of an element in the table layout.
      boolean startDefined
      Indicates whether an index is set for the start cell of a component in the table layout.
      float weight
      Indicates the weight of an element in the table layout.

    • Field Detail

      • alignment

        public final int alignment
        Defines vertical alignment for rows or horizontal alignment for columns.

      • span

        public final TableLayout.CellSpan span
        Defines the start cell and cell span of an element in the table layout.
        See Also:
        TableLayout.CellSpan

      • startDefined

        public final boolean startDefined
        Indicates whether an index is set for the start cell of a component in the table layout.

        The value True indicates that an index is set for the start cell of a component in the grid layout; the value False indicates that no index is set for the start cell of a component in the table layout.

        Since:
        1

      • weight

        public final float weight
        Indicates the weight of an element in the table layout.
